meta.name: LIBRARY
meta.desc: Our inhouse library of useful documents for our tools and anything else

lobby.title: ZIKYinc Library
lobby.subtitle: Docs for Days
lobby.welcome: Welcome to the ZIKYinc Document Library, a curated collection of resources, guides, and documentation for our projects.
lobby.what_its_for: This library serves as a central knowledge base for our tools, creative projects, and submission guidelines. Whether you're a developer looking for API docs or an artist wanting to learn more about our process, you'll find it here.
lobby.what_it_covers: Explore documentation for our web tools, user manuals for Windows applications, in-depth articles on music production techniques, and much more.
lobby.adding_documents: Our library is constantly growing. We encourage community contributions and will be opening up a process for submitting your own documentation soon.
